amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of the Army to develop a comprehensive plan for the deauthorization of deep draft navigation on the Mississippi River Gulf Outlet and address wetland losses and other issues relating to that Outlet.

action.text: Amendment SA 3750 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3750.

Amendment SA 3750 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S3943-3944; text: CR S3943-3944) To direct the Secretary of the Army to develop a comprehensive plan for the deauthorization of deep draft navigation on the Mississippi River Gulf Outlet and address wetland losses and other issues relating to that Outlet.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3750 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
